CustomField.formula: IF(UserGem__CurrentCompanyEmployees__c <=99, '1 - 99', IF(UserGem__CurrentCompanyEmployees__c <=499,'100 - 499', IF(UserGem__CurrentCompanyEmployees__c <=999, '500 - 999', IF(UserGem__CurrentCompanyEmployees__c <=4999, '1000 - 4999', IF(UserGem__CurrentCompanyEmployees__c >5000, '5000+', NULL )))))
CustomField.label: UG Account Employees
